description: TDD progress log tracking RED-GREEN cycles

tests.description: toggleFlag should flag an unflagged cell
tests.notes: Already green - toggleFlag implemented in previous test

tests.description: toggleFlag should unflag a flagged cell
tests.notes: Already green - toggleFlag already toggles correctly

tests.description: toggleFlag should not flag a revealed cell
tests.notes: Added isRevealed check to toggleFlag method

tests.description: setMine should mark cell as a mine
tests.notes: Added setMine method

tests.description: setAdjacentMines should set the adjacent mine count
tests.notes: Added setAdjacentMines method - Cell class complete!

tests.description: should create a board with specified rows and cols
tests.notes: Board class created with rows and cols properties

tests.description: should initialize a grid of cells
tests.notes: Added _initializeGrid method to create 2D array

tests.description: should populate grid with Cell instances
tests.notes: Updated _initializeGrid to create Cell instances with correct row/col

tests.description: getCell should return cell at given position
tests.notes: Added getCell method to retrieve cell by row and col

tests.description: getCell should return null for out-of-bounds position
tests.notes: Added bounds checking to getCell method

tests.description: getNeighbors should return 8 neighbors for center cell
tests.notes: Implemented getNeighbors method to find all 8 adjacent cells

tests.description: getNeighbors should return 3 neighbors for corner cell
tests.notes: Already green - getNeighbors correctly filters out-of-bounds cells

tests.description: placeMines should place correct number of mines
tests.notes: Implemented random mine placement with duplicate prevention

tests.description: calculateAdjacentMines should set correct counts
tests.notes: Implemented adjacent mine calculation using getNeighbors and filter - Board class core complete!

tests.description: revealCell should reveal a non-mine cell
tests.notes: Added revealCell method that calls cell.reveal()

tests.description: revealCell should trigger flood-fill for empty cells with 0 adjacent mines
tests.notes: Implemented recursive flood-fill algorithm for cells with 0 adjacent mines

tests.description: isGameWon should return true when all non-mine cells are revealed
tests.notes: Implemented win condition check - iterates all cells to verify non-mines are revealed

tests.description: isGameLost should return true when a mine is revealed
tests.notes: Implemented lose condition check - finds any revealed mine

tests.description: isGameLost should return false when no mines are revealed
tests.notes: Validates isGameLost returns false when game is still in progress

tests.description: should initialize a new game with specified dimensions and mine count
tests.notes: Created GameController with startNewGame and getGameState methods

tests.description: handleCellClick should reveal a cell when clicked
tests.notes: Implemented handleCellClick with win/lose detection

tests.description: should ensure first click never hits a mine
tests.notes: Implemented first-click guarantee - regenerates board until clicked cell is not a mine

tests.description: handleCellRightClick should toggle flag on cell
tests.notes: Implemented handleCellRightClick to toggle flags

tests.description: should create a board container element
tests.notes: Created BoardRenderer class with render() method that creates .board div

tests.description: should render correct number of cell elements
tests.notes: Added nested loop to create cell div for each position in board grid

tests.description: should set data-row and data-col attributes on each cell
tests.notes: Added data-row and data-col attributes to cell elements for event handling

tests.description: should add cell-hidden class to unrevealed cells
tests.notes: Added cell-hidden class for unrevealed cells by checking cell.isRevealed

tests.description: should add cell-revealed class to revealed cells
tests.notes: Added else branch to add cell-revealed class when cell.isRevealed is true

tests.description: should add cell-flagged class to flagged cells
tests.notes: Added check for cell.isFlagged to apply cell-flagged class

tests.description: should display adjacent mine count on revealed cells with mines nearby
tests.notes: Added content display - show adjacentMines count for revealed cells with adjacentMines > 0

tests.description: should display empty content on revealed cells with 0 adjacent mines
tests.notes: Already green - previous implementation only adds content when adjacentMines > 0

tests.description: should display mine symbol on revealed mine cells
tests.notes: Added mine symbol display - check cell.isMine and show ðŸ’£ for revealed mines

tests.description: should display flag symbol on flagged cells
tests.notes: Added flag symbol display - check cell.isFlagged first and show ðŸš©

tests.description: should set CSS grid-template properties based on board dimensions
tests.notes: Set grid-template-rows and grid-template-columns using board rows/cols for responsive grid

tests.description: should clear and re-render when render() called multiple times
tests.notes: Clear container with innerHTML = '' before rendering to enable state updates

tests.description: should accept container and gameController in constructor
tests.notes: Created InputHandler class with constructor storing container and gameController

tests.description: should attach click event listener to container
tests.notes: Added click event listener in constructor with handleClick method

tests.description: should call gameController.handleCellClick with correct row/col on cell click
tests.notes: Implemented handleClick to extract data-row/data-col attributes and call gameController.handleCellClick

tests.description: should attach contextmenu event listener to container
tests.notes: Added contextmenu event listener in constructor with handleContextMenu method

tests.description: should call gameController.handleCellRightClick with correct row/col on cell right-click
tests.notes: Implemented handleContextMenu to extract data-row/data-col attributes and call gameController.handleCellRightClick

tests.description: should prevent default context menu behavior
tests.notes: Added event.preventDefault() to handleContextMenu to prevent browser context menu

tests.description: should ignore clicks on non-cell elements (no data-row/data-col attributes)
tests.notes: Already green - handleClick checks for null row/col before calling gameController

tests.description: should ignore right-clicks on non-cell elements
tests.notes: Already green - handleContextMenu checks for null row/col before calling gameController

tests.description: should ignore clicks on elements with invalid data-row (NaN injection)
tests.notes: Fixed with _getCellCoordinates helper - validates parseInt result with isNaN check. Security vulnerability resolved!

tests.description: should ignore clicks on elements with empty data attributes
tests.notes: Fixed with _getCellCoordinates helper - empty strings now rejected by isNaN validation

tests.description: should ignore clicks on elements with only partial attributes
tests.notes: Already green - null check handles missing data-col attribute

tests.description: should remove event listeners when destroy() is called
tests.notes: Added destroy() method with removeEventListener for both click and contextmenu. Prevents memory leaks!
